---
title: Examples of Old Shókë
---

To do: develop this a bit more and try to push the boundary of what's expressible this way.

* _Kæt xoma ke shem_: I will sleep tonight. Or, _Ke kæt xom shem_.
* _Shoke trk mrm-kætr_: Let's go and drink water.
* _Ke no mrm shoxtr_: I will give him/her water.
* _Sho tik koch kætr kesh shoxtr_: Take the sharp stone and make fire (strike sparks)
* _Che che che che che ... shoke nozh thothrk_ che _g&aelig;m_: No no no no no ... we are _not_ eating those mushrooms.
* _Jitjit dhæm shem_: The bird is sleeping in the tree.
